title: Is going from 174 cm to 177 cm a noticeable difference in height? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes, 3 or 5 cm or more that is started to see the difference. In contrast, 1 or 2 cm difference is quite unnoticeable. For example, I am 178 cm (177.5 - 177.8 cm actually), I have a friend who is 180 cm, everyone say that I am as tall as him, I have an another friend who is 174 cm but everyboday say that I am taller than him a bit. And you should know that we have various heights during a day, it is common that morning height is taller than evening height about 1 or 1.5 cm due to gravity of the earth.
